channel.description: *Rabbit found [on deviantart][1] - went for bunnies thinking first about Alice's, then hats, then Bugs's...* :stuck_out_tongue: This post [started on stackoverflow][2]... Might seem completely unrelated, hope the link makes it at least a bit more clear. In my humble opinion [privacy][3] (oh [privacy][4]), security (to be linked, eventually) and even the *financial system* (more to be said much later on) as a whole must be rethought and remade. Trying not to suggest (or am I?) I do have a better solution. Just that we need to **start looking at it** (like [to super ai][5]) and *in different ways* (lots of promised future links huh?). Automation through technology is [killing our current economic models for a lot of people][6] (including [me][7], of course). I'll keep it this "short" this time, and let the links speak for themselves.
